title: Lack of Training Led Capitol Police to Temper Riot Response, Watchdog Says
description: The forceâ€™s inspector general testified that a top official ordered officers not to use their most powerful anti-riot tools on Jan. 6 because of concerns they did not know how.

title: A Partial List of Mass Shootings in the United States in 2021
description: The shootings never stopped during the coronavirus pandemic, they just became less public, researchers say.

title: After Years of Wrangling, World War I Memorial Raises First Flag
description: As the United States withdraws from its longest war, a memorial that recognizes one of its most complicated ones officially opens in Washington, D.C., on Friday.

title: Hiker Rescued After Man Uses Photo to Pinpoint His Location
description: Rene Compean, who had been missing in the mountains of Southern California, was found on Tuesday after a stranger deduced his location from a photo posted by the authorities.
